publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3257.1 Derek Brownlee: Scottish Government’s Response to the Scottish Council of Economic Advisers’ Annual Report—As an amendment to motion (S3M-3257) in the name of Fiona Hyslop, insert at end "and in particular notes the commitment to an independent assessment of the full economic costs and abatement potential of the various energy options, including nuclear power, which are open to Scotland."
